column2:
#display top 25
sci_spi_disp <- index_1 %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  filter(date==2019) %>%
  arrange(-SPI.INDEX) %>%
  mutate(across(starts_with('SPI.INDEX'),~100*.),
         across(starts_with('SPI.INDEX'),round,1)) %>%
  select(country, iso3c, date, starts_with('SPI.INDEX')) %>%
  left_join(sci_df)
